metadata.title: CVE-2020-24342 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
Lua through 5.4.0 allows a stack redzone cross in luaO_pushvfstring because a protection mechanism wrongly calls luaD_callnoyield twice in a row.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-24342` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblua5.4-0 - 5.4.1-1
lua5.4 - 5.4.1-1
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> couldn't reproduce on lua earlier than 5.4, and problematic code doesn't seem present. Marking as not-affected.

criterions.comment: lua5.4 package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.4.1-1').
